title.rendered: Dhoni, Kohli, and Rohit lose Blue Tweeter status under new Twitter Policy for ‘Blue Tick’

content.rendered:
The famous cricketers of India-Virat Kohli, MS Dhoni, and Rohit Sharma has a major change to their Twitter profile On Friday morning. As all three lost their blue ticks. They also have lost their profile names on the platform. Players like Virat Kohli, MS Dhoni, Sharma, and some other great cricketers have continued to grow under their separate heritage Blue markers. But as per the new Elon Mask-led Twitter policy for subscribed service of the ‘Blue Tick’ with its benefits is payable for its users.

So, due to no payment of the same by these Cricket stars, they have lost the ‘blue tick’ privilege facility of their Twitter profiles.

A lot has happed on the platform since Elon Musk took over Twitter. Musk had preliminarily blazoned that the only way to corroborate Blue Tick imprinting on biographies was to pay for this subscribed service. Still, Dhoni, Rohit, and Kohli, among colourful other Twitter users, don’t appear to have discipline.

These users need to pay them else by dereliction confirmation marker. That is why everyone lost their blue check on Friday morning.

Twitter Blue is now a paid service by Elon Musk headed company. It does not just offer vindicated checkmarks on biographies upon subscription but also comes with many other benefits. Twitter Blue has been made available on both iOS and Android bias and those using Twitter’s website can also buy it.

(Read Also: The IPL Story – How the Franchise Started 15 Years Ago)

The yearly subscription figure for iOS and Android users in India is Rs. 900 while the figure has been kept lower at Rs. 650 per month for the web. users can also subscribe to the decoration service for a periodic figure of Rs. 6,800, which will bring roughly Rs.566 per month. still, this plan is only available on the web.

In the US, Twitter Blue can be subscribed for$ 11 per month on Android and iOS bias and for$ 8 on the web. The periodic plan costs$ 84 in the US.

Before the introduction of its Twitter Blue service, the blue tickwas for the authentic accounts of famous personalities, politicians, intellectuals, and public icons.

Now, this service is sellable to all, who can pay and enjoy this type of service .

Besides the blue tick, Twitter Blue subscribers will get early access to features like edit tweets, bookmark flyers, custom app icons, and NFT profile film land.

These category users will also be suitable to choose different colour themes for their app, prioritize their replies on tweets, and undo a tweet before it becomes visible to other users. Twitter Blue subscribers get a longer character limit of 4,000 while the character limit for other users is 280.

The paid subscription also allows users to upload longer vids of over 60 twinkles or have a size of over 2 GB.
